MacBook Pro teardown confirms the new keyboard is basically just the old, good keyboard →

Posted on November 18, 2019 — less than 1 minute read (66 words)

Just last week, Apple introduced new 16” Macbook Pro line up, and i’ve complained about Macbook Pro for quite some times.

As per iFixit reported (re-reported by The Verge) about the new 16” Macbook Pro with “new” keyboard, which is basically an old scissor keyboard.

Video review from The Verge
